data.title: Sustainably Sourced
data.subtitle: Sustainably Sourced
data.description: Committed to sustainable sourcing and ethical craftsmanship, delivering quality apparel with a positive impact.

section_data.title: Home Overview
section_data.subtitle: Since 2010
section_data.description:
Years of Excellence

ECO Sourcing Limited is a Bangladesh-based apparel sourcing company committed to sustainability and ethical production. Specializing in high-quality denim apparel, they partner with trusted manufacturers to ensure eco-friendly materials, fair labor practices, and global quality standards.

section_data.title: Home Gallery
section_data.subtitle: Comprehensive Sourcing Solutions Tailored for You

data.title: Research
data.description: We conduct extensive trend analysis and stay ahead of the latest washes, fits, and fabrics to ensure innovative and competitive product development. Our dedicated fabric team focuses on sourcing sustainable, certified fabrics while also developing local alternatives to imported fabrics for lower costs and faster delivery.

data.title: Design & Development
data.description: We have a large team of both local and foreign designers, as well as expert wash technicians, CAD operators, and fit technicians, who create new collections aligned with our clients seasonal needs. Our team develops over 100+ samples each month, and ensures ND support, providing brands with multiple options and ensuring a seamless transition from design to production.

data.title: Production Support
data.description: We source top mills and factories for stitching and washing, specific to clients’ needs. Our supplier management ensures smooth operations, while our own dedicated QA teams at factories maintain quality. Our in-house wash technicians ensure color accuracy, and our safety officers oversee compliance, especially for kidswear.

data.title: Buyer Support
data.description: Our dedicated merchandisers provide 24/7 support, ensuring quick responses, competitive pricing, and full production tracking. We bridge buyers and suppliers seamlessly, optimizing costs and efficiency, while maintaining full transparency.
